alert.note: Alert for Adams (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 5:10PM CDT until June 10 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... North central Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 509 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sicily Island, or 11 miles northeast of Harrisonburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lee Bayou around 515 PM CDT. Cooter Point around 530 PM CDT. Waterproof and Helena around 535 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
